name: Salkantay Trek To Machupicchu 5 Days
description: Salkantay Trek is one of the most popular alternative treks, it has amazing landscapes. This 5-days trekking expedition will take you to the base of the sacred Salkantay snow-peaked mountain (6.271 meters, 20,700 feet), considered by locals to be the “Guardian Spirit of the Andean.” Doing this trek will give you the opportunity to experience remote native communities as well as the region’s great ecological biodiversity before reaching Machu Picchu. The highest and most challenging part of this trek will take you to 14,989 feet (4,570 meters). We will take horses along the way and also provide you with top-quality camping equipment as well as very balanced and carbohydrate-rich foods.
